subject: Public Speaking
title: Public Forum Debate
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Public Forum Debate.

hook.text: Public Forum is FOR the public. Judges are often regular people.

buildup.text: PF avoids speed advantages. It values clarity and direct clash.

discovery.text: PF debates current events. Topics change monthly.

twist.text: Because judges aren't debate-fluent, clarity beats complexity.

climax.text: PF is where speaking skills matter as much as logic.
